results.title: Investigation of the short-term effects of a transdermal formulation of atenolol in healthy cats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS AND CLINICAL RELEVANCE: Topical administration of the formulation as described resulted in targeted serum @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ concentrations in most @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@, with attendant @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@HR reduction@@@.

citations.NLM: LeBlanc NL, Scollan KF, Mohamed S, Christensen JM. Investigation of the short-term effects of a transdermal formulation of atenolol in healthy cats. Am J Vet Res. 2021 Oct;82(10):811-817. PMID: 34554869
citations.BibTeX: @article{34554869, title={Investigation of the short-term effects of a transdermal formulation of atenolol in healthy cats.}, author={LeBlanc NL and Scollan KF and Mohamed S and Christensen JM}, journal={Am J Vet Res}, volume={82}, number={10}, pages={811-817}}

results.title: Ivabradine and atenolol overdose managed with renal replacement therapy: A case report.
results.text_hl: This case report discusses the clinical course of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who presented with profound @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ after ingesting large doses of @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Weigel B, Stott M, Tyler D, Ball M, Crutchfield C. Ivabradine and atenolol overdose managed with renal replacement therapy: A case report. Am J Emerg Med. 2025 May 29;():. PMID: 40461358
citations.BibTeX: @article{40461358, title={Ivabradine and atenolol overdose managed with renal replacement therapy: A case report.}, author={Weigel B and Stott M and Tyler D and Ball M and Crutchfield C}, journal={Am J Emerg Med}}

results.title: Extracorporeal treatment for poisoning to beta-adrenergic antagonists: systematic review and recommendations from the EXTRIP workgroup
results.text_hl: Indications for ECTR in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@impaired kidney function@@@ include refractory @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ for @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@ @DISEASE_Poisoning @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@, and recurrent @DISEASE_Torsades_de_Pointes @DISEASE_MESH:D016171 @@@torsade de pointes@@@ for @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@.

citations.NLM: Bouchard J, Shepherd G, Hoffman RS, Gosselin S, Roberts DM, Li Y, Nolin TD, Lavergne V, Ghannoum M, EXTRIP workgroup. Extracorporeal treatment for poisoning to beta-adrenergic antagonists: systematic review and recommendations from the EXTRIP workgroup Crit Care. 2021 Jun 10;25(1):201. PMID: 34112223

results.title: Successful Therapeutic Hypothermia in a Patient with Drug-Induced J Waves and Cardiac Arrest: A Case Report
results.text_hl: A 50-year-old man was admitted to our hospital with @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ after receiving high doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_etizolam @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044610 @@@etizolam@@@.

citations.NLM: Sato J, Yagi T, Shimada E, Kobori M, Watanabe K, Kuwana T, Chiba N, Saito T, Kinoshita K. Successful Therapeutic Hypothermia in a Patient with Drug-Induced J Waves and Cardiac Arrest: A Case Report Ther Hypothermia Temp Manag. 2023 Sep 19;():. PMID: 37722017

results.title: Non-antimicrobial pharmaceuticals can affect the development of antibiotic resistance in hospital wastewater.
results.text_hl: Effect on resistance development of two @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ relief medications (@CHEMICAL_Carbamazepine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002220 @@@carbamazepine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Tramadol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014147 @@@tramadol@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive medications@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@), and the @CHEMICAL_Nicotine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009538 @@@nicotine@@@ metabolite (@CHEMICAL_Cotinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003367 @@@cotinine@@@) was also investigated.

citations.NLM: Bírošová L, Lépesová K, Grabic R, Mackuľak T. Non-antimicrobial pharmaceuticals can affect the development of antibiotic resistance in hospital wastewater. Environ Sci Pollut Res Int. 2020 Apr;27(12):13501-13511. PMID: 32026368

results.title: Insulin concentrations following termination of high-dose insulin euglycemic therapy.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORTS: A 50-year-old woman and a 45-year-old man experienced @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ after overdosing on @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.
